questions.question: 1. I understand that my active participation in the SMP Mentor Orientation and all other SMP departmental sessions getting organized by Mentor Review Board will be mandatory.
2. I understand that my participation in the SMP as a Student Mentor requires me to stay connected to my mentees and provide them mentorship through regular interactions.
3. I understand that my role as a Student Mentor requires me to be sensitive towards the information and issues that my mentees share with me.
4. I would therefore protect the privacy of my mentees by not discussing/sharing/joking about what they have shared in casual conversations with friends.
5. I would therefore protect the privacy of my mentees by not posting about what mentees have shared on social media.
6. I would therefore protect the privacy of my mentees by not using the information they are sharing against them.
7. I would therefore protect the privacy of my mentees by not using information shared by the mentees to pass value judgements on them.
8. I would therefore protect the privacy of my mentees by not using information shared by mentees to coerce them into giving favours
9. I would therefore protect the privacy of my mentees by respecting their agency in deciding when and what to share with you
10. I would therefore protect the privacy of my mentees by not using anything shared by mentees for any other purposes outside of the scope of SMP mentorship
11. I hereby confirm my participation in the SMP as a Student Mentor.
